column4: David, the two files that you need are in the link I provided you with.  Have you already tried downloading them, then following the directions on the page you referred to?
Shea, what sound card do you have?
lspci says: 0000:00:14.5 Multimedia audio controller: ATI Technologies Inc IXP SB400 AC'97 Audio Controller (rev 02)
My sound won't work on an ATI IXP sound card -- it did before I upgraded from KDE 3.5.2 to 3.5.3 -- help
Shea, did ubotu whisper you with some links?
sorry -- did not see -- I read the first one, but for the second -- I'm ubing dapper, not hoary, but I'll look anyway'
Looked -- I don;t use ESD either -- I use arts
Not really..  I'm having some of the same issues as you, except that my sound card is ancient.
Did you check in the wiki to see if your sound card is supported?  Or maybe in the forums for help.
I'll look at some of Xine's conf
try sudo aptitude update It's been working for me, AFAIK.
I'm not sure what to tell you then Shea.  It stopped working when you upgraded, or did it work for a while after you upgraded?
